questionTitle: There were ____ many questions to answer; so I only did three.
I didn't understand the lesson well ____ but I managed to answer the teacher's questions.
The room wasn't warm ____ so the worker turned the air-conditioner on.
The tourist bought the jacket because it wasn't ____ expensive for him.
My brother is old ____ to drive the car by himself.
The test was far ____ difficult for the students to do.
The suitcase was ____ heavy for the kid to pick up.
We haven't got ____ time to take a holiday this year.
The coffee was ____ hot to drink; so I left it for a minute to cool.
The teacher must give students ____ practice exercises to understand this lesson.
